```{r, data cleaning}

library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(purrr)
library(broom)
library(scales)
library(ggthemes)
library(sf)
library(tigris)

homicides <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/washingtonpost/data-homicides/master/homicide-data.csv")

homicides <- homicides %>% 
  unite(city_name, city, state, sep = ", ")

homicides %>% 
  group_by(city_name) %>% 
  summarize(total = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(total)) %>% 
  slice(-51) 

homicides <- homicides %>% 
  filter(city_name == "Washington, DC")

```
